• ItAnt: Rusuccuru colonia m.p. XII Iomnio municipio
  • TP: Rvsvccvrv colo¯n XXVIII Iominio Mvnicipio

connections.title: Iomnium

references.formattedCitation: Talbert, Richard. “Database: Peutinger Map Names and Features, with Commentary and User’s Guide.” In Explore the Peutinger Map. Cambridge UP, 2010. http://www.cambridge.org/us/talbert/talbertdatabase/prm.html.

description: The ancient city of Rusuccuru was founded as a Punic settlement on the Oued Sebaou river. In the Roman period, an inscription indicates that Rusuccuru achieved the status of municipium under Septimius Severus, yet some sources continue to refer to it as a colonia.
